about_the_game:
Are you ready to feel the magic at your fingertips, go on an unforgettable adventure, and be part of an epic story in a fantastical world? Explore the depths of mysterious dungeons and embark on an epic journey in Wizards Legacy! As a desperate father seeking a cure for his ailing child, you must delve into the heart of darkness, facing untold perils and ancient evils to earn the favor of Hex’O’Cura. Witness the unfolding tales of lost souls and uncover the secret of The Corruption. Be the powerful wizard that you have always meant to be in this action-adventure of the past as you venture deeper into the roguelite game!



Wizard’s Legacy lets players cast spells with their own hand gestures! Draw symbols in the air to control fire balls, ice walls, lightning - the whole package! Fight enemies and explore the world using gesture based mechanics to become a true wizard.





Engage with a myriad of interactive elements that respond to your actions, adding depth and immersion to your journey. You can collect potions, perk cards for your character development, crystals for HP, and other items to boost your abilities.


The dungeon is filled with enemies, each encounter demanding a unique strategy. You'll need to adapt your tactics to overcome each enemy’s strengths and exploit their weaknesses. Prepare to face a diverse array of enemies, each testing your skills and pushing you to the limit. Only the most resourceful can emerge victorious from these perilous depths.




Wizard’s Legacy lets you choose your own way. Every decision you make changes your progression and the world. Explore different paths, find hidden secrets, and face all sorts of challenges as you journey deeper and deeper. Pick up the card or don’t, - it's all up to you, and it all affects how your adventure ends.




You can select from a diverse set of characters, each with their own distinct set of abilities and spells. Experiment with different combinations of spells and strategies as you uncover the strengths and weaknesses of each character. With a variety of playstyles to explore, every choice you make will shape your journey through the mystical realms of Wizard’s Legacy.


Wizard’s Legacy offers fascinating environments where every detail has been carefully crafted to enhance your gaming experience. Lose yourself in the breathtaking visuals that bring the world of Wizards Legacy to life, from lush forests to ominous dungeons, each scene is a masterpiece waiting to be explored.




Player assumes the role of a desperate father striving to cure his deathly ill child, resisting every cure. Hex'O'Cura offered a chance at healing, but demanded a terrible price: defeating a great evil within a dangerous dungeon. Driven by desperation, the father started his journey. Hex'O'Cura offered a powerful artifact called the Gyratio, but with a cruel twist. It kept his child alive, yet not truly healed. As he delved deeper, the dungeon revealed its grim history with each battle. Every wound he received brought healing, but also forced him back, a prisoner of the book's twisted magic. He had to fight on, each step a desperate hope for his child's survival.

name: Wizard's Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or greater
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest Pro, Meta Quest 3, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or greater
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest Pro, Meta Quest 3, Valve Index

short_description: Wizard’s Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.
